descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/JOTXnWN.png[/img][/center][center][b][size=3]Introduction[/size][/b][/center]
Are you tired of that Skooma which only regenerates 25 stamina points?
Skyrim isn't the "drug paradise" your Khajiits shamans always spoke of when you were just a little child? Then THIS is what you absolutely need.
Let me introduce you the "Criminal Skum", a simple and little mod which finally makes special that tiny, little bottle.

You can take those 25 stamina points and throw them in the first recycle bin you can find nearby.
So please, say welcome to your new bottled friend!

[b][i]Italian Version:[/i][/b]
[url=http://tes.forumfree.it/?t=66254256]Link[/url]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yA1hucC.png[/img][/center][center][b][size=3]How it works

[/size][/b][/center]The new Skooma has been developed to be the new perfect friend for who needs "a boost", but with every risk involved by using a harmful drug.
If you choose to use the Skooma, you do it because you really really need to in that precise moment...
This new little bottle contains a sugary fluid, which is highly stimulant and hallucinogenic for both your mind and your body, and it acts in 3 different phases.

[b][i][size=3]Phase 1: "The shock"[/size][/i][/b]
From the exact moment you decide to drink it, the new Skooma will disorient you for 20 seconds. Your space-time perception will be altered, and everything will seem faster.
It's not advisable to enter in a fight during this phase, because your character's action won't be precise at all.
The first phase comprehends also a part of the second phase.

[b][i][size=3]Phase 2: "The boost"[/size][/i][/b]
This is why you want to use this particular drug.
You want to be strong, you want to be powerful, you want to be invincible.
For exactly a minute you'll gain a strong health bonus and an extreme buff to your stamina and your magicka, but your visual will be blurred. Your reflexes, however, will be fast and responsive.
No enemy will seem that strong after your use of this new Skooma.

[b][i][size=3]Phase 3: "The tiredness"[/size][/i][/b]
This drug has also some colleteral effects, and its use will bring down your body: not only your magicka and stamina regeneration will decrease, you'll also lose your health bonus.
But you can always drink a little more Skooma...

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yA1hucC.png[/img][/center][b][center][size=3]Technical specifications[/size][/center][/b]Weight reduced to 0,1
From the moment you drink it:

[list][*]Blurred vision for 80 seconds
[/*]
[*]Slowed time (only for your character) for 20 seconds
[/*]
[*]Health bonus of 200 points for 80 seconds
[/*]
[*]Stamina bonus of 2000 points for 80 seconds
[/*]
[*]Magicka bonus of 2000 points for 80 seconds
[/*]
[*]Damage magicka at the rate of 2 points per seconf for 320 seconds
[/*]
[*]Damage stamina at the rate of 2 pooints per seconds for 320 seconds[/*]
[/list]
[b][size=3][center]Crafting[/center][/size][/b]It's possible to craft Skooma in your own house, just by using a pot over a fire.
For its production you're going to need:

[list][*]x2 Moon Sugar
[/*]
[*]x3 Lavender
[/*]
[*]x3 Juniper berries
[/*]
[/list]
Using these ingredients will yield one bottle of Skooma per craft.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/JmjaDNx.png[/img][/center]

This is the surpise of this mod, a second type of Skooma I've put in the game.

This Skooma is special, secretly used by M'aiq the Liar to remain young, to ride the waves of time and alter it at his pleasure.
But to travel in time and find yourself in the future, you'll need to relax and prepare your own body to this temporal laceration.
You'll remain the same, but the world around you will change forever...

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yA1hucC.png[/img][/center][b][center][size=3]Effects[/size][/center][/b]
From the moment you'll drink the fluid, everything around you will change irreparably, and EVERYTHING can happen. The laws of physics, your perception of the world and that of the people around you will be altered forever.


[size=3][center][b][color=#ff7700]>> Warning! <<

[/color][/b][/center][/size]It's unadvisable to use this type of Skooma on low-end computers, because it generates massive lag for some seconds.
It's also unadvisable to use this Skooma in places you DON'T want to be modified.
The game will always lag after drinking: don't worry, everything it's normal, just let the time flow for some moments.
This Skooma can potentially kill other people.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yA1hucC.png[/img][/center][center][b][size=3]Crafting[/size][/b][/center]
As for the classic Skooma, also the Twisting Time one can be crafted in your house or in a tavern.
You're going to need:

[list][*]x1 Canis root
[/*]
[*]x1 Daedra's heart
[/*]
[*]x1 Ice Wraith Teeth
[/*]
[*]x2 Moon Sugar
[/*]
[/list]
Using these ingredients will yield one bottle of Skooma per craft.
